txt.en: There are mounted scouts of the Enemy abroad
Defeat mounted enemies in the Entwash Vale ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
While patrolling the Entwash Vale for Lord Ingmar, you came across some Orc-scouts.
While patrolling the Entwash Vale for Lord Ingmar, you came across some Orc-scouts.\n\nYou should defeat a few.
Mounted enemies can be found throughout the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should take the opportunity to clear some of the mounted scouts of the Enemy from the Entwash Vale.
'You acted wisely, [placeholder]. The fewer mounted enemies we face, the greater our advantage.'
Mounted enemies can be found throughout the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should take the opportunity to clear some of the mounted scouts of the Enemy from the Entwash Vale.
Lord Ingmar is in the Mead Hall of Eaworth, in the Entwash Vale.\n\nYou should return to Lord Ingmar and let him know what you have done.
